GROA_variables.name: aboveground_biomass
ForC_variable.name: biomass_ag_OM
ForC_description: Total aboveground live biomass. May include biomass of reproductive structures and understory biomass, if data are available. Dead wood excluded.

GROA_variables.name: aboveground_biomass + belowground_biomass
ForC_variable.name: biomass_OM
ForC_description: Total live biomass.

GROA_variables.name: aboveground_biomass + understory_biomass
ForC_variable.name: biomass_ag_OM
ForC_description: Total aboveground live biomass. May include biomass of reproductive structures and understory biomass, if data are available. Dead wood excluded.

GROA_variables.name: aboveground_biomass_woody
ForC_variable.name: biomass_ag_woody_OM
ForC_description: Total aboveground structural (stem + branch) biomass

GROA_variables.name: aboveground_carbon
ForC_variable.name: biomass_ag_C
ForC_description: Total carbon in aboveground live biomass. May include biomass of reproductive structures and understory biomass, if data are available. Dead wood excluded.

GROA_variables.name: aboveground_carbon + belowground_carbon
ForC_variable.name: biomass_C
ForC_description: Total carbon in live biomass.

GROA_variables.name: aboveground_carbon + belowground_carbon + understory_carbon
ForC_variable.name: biomass_C
ForC_description: Total carbon in live biomass.

GROA_variables.name: aboveground_carbon + litter_carbon
GROA_covariate: forest floor + CWD, litter + dead woody debris
GROA_description: litter = non-living organic material. May include litter, dead wood, or any combination thereof, as indicated in components covariate
ForC_variable.name: total.ecosystem_2_C
ForC_description: Total ecosystem carbon in organic matter, including total biomass, deadwood, and organic layer but excluding soil organic carbon.

GROA_covariate: litter, forest floor, CWD, FWD + CWD, FWD+CWD
GROA_description: litter = non-living organic material. May include litter, dead wood, or any combination thereof, as indicated in components covariate
ForC_variable.name: NA

GROA_variables.name: aboveground_carbon + understory_carbon
ForC_variable.name: biomass_ag_C
ForC_description: Total carbon in aboveground live biomass. May include biomass of reproductive structures and understory biomass, if data are available. Dead wood excluded.

GROA_variables.name: aboveground_carbon + understory_carbon + belowground_carbon + litter_carbon
ForC_variable.name: total.ecosystem_2_C
ForC_description: Total ecosystem carbon in organic matter, including total biomass, deadwood, and organic layer but excluding soil organic carbon.

GROA_variables.name: belowground_biomass
ForC_variable.name: biomass_root_OM
ForC_description: Total root biomass

GROA_variables.name: belowground_biomass_fine
ForC_variable.name: biomass_root_fine_OM
ForC_description: Total fine root biomass. Typical size cutoff (max.diameter_root) is 1-2 mm diameter, with preference given to max.diameter_root = 1 mm when there is an option.

GROA_variables.name: belowground_carbon
ForC_variable.name: biomass_root_C
ForC_description: Total carbon in root biomass

GROA_variables.name: litter_biomass
GROA_description: litter = non-living organic material. May include litter, dead wood, or any combination thereof, as indicated in components covariate
ForC_variable.name: organic.layer_OM
ForC_description: Mass of litter/ organic layer/ forest floor

GROA_description: litter = non-living organic material. May include litter, dead wood, or any combination thereof, as indicated in components covariate
ForC_variable.name: deadwood_down_OM
ForC_description: Total mass of downed dead wood (coarse and sometimes fine woody debris)

GROA_description: litter = non-living organic material. May include litter, dead wood, or any combination thereof, as indicated in components covariate
ForC_variable.name: deadwood_down_OM
ForC_description: Total mass of downed dead wood (coarse and sometimes fine woody debris)

GROA_covariate: forest floor + CWD, litter + dead woody debris
GROA_description: litter = non-living organic material. May include litter, dead wood, or any combination thereof, as indicated in components covariate
ForC_variable.name: NA

GROA_variables.name: litter_biomass + understory_biomass
GROA_description: litter = non-living organic material. May include litter, dead wood, or any combination thereof, as indicated in components covariate
ForC_variable.name: NA

GROA_variables.name: litter_carbon
GROA_description: litter = non-living organic material. May include litter, dead wood, or any combination thereof, as indicated in components covariate
ForC_variable.name: organic.layer_C
ForC_description: Mass of litter/ organic layer/ forest floor

GROA_description: litter = non-living organic material. May include litter, dead wood, or any combination thereof, as indicated in components covariate
ForC_variable.name: deadwood_down_C
ForC_description: Total carbon in downed dead wood (coarse and sometimes fine woody debris)

GROA_description: litter = non-living organic material. May include litter, dead wood, or any combination thereof, as indicated in components covariate
ForC_variable.name: deadwood_down_C
ForC_description: Total carbon in downed dead wood (coarse and sometimes fine woody debris)

GROA_covariate: forest floor + CWD, litter + dead woody debris
GROA_description: litter = non-living organic material. May include litter, dead wood, or any combination thereof, as indicated in components covariate
ForC_variable.name: NA

GROA_variables.name: understory_biomass
ForC_variable.name: biomass_ag_understory_OM
ForC_description: Total understory biomass, where understory is most commonly defined as trees shorter than breast height.

GROA_variables.name: understory_carbon
ForC_variable.name: biomass_ag_understory_C
ForC_description: Total carbon in understory biomass, where understory is most commonly defined as trees shorter than breast height.

GROA_variables.name: SOC
ForC_variable.name: soil_C
ForC_description: Soil organic carbon to specified depth in mineral soil

GROA_variables.name: SOM_per
ForC_variable.name: soil_OM
ForC_description: Soil organic matter to specified depth in mineral soil
